headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Johnson Controls International (JCI) After Its 62% One-Year Rally?
summary: If you are wondering whether Johnson Controls International is priced fairly after its strong run, it helps to step back and separate share price excitement from underlying value. The stock last closed at US$122.98, with returns of 6.9% over 7 days, 0.5% over 30 days, 0.5% year to date, 62.2% over 1 year, 98.6% over 3 years and 163.5% over 5 years. This gives plenty of context for anyone thinking about what comes next. Recent attention on Johnson Controls International has focused on broader...
